snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes a case that the iPhone has become so good that the latest changes didn't, and couldn't, improve it very much, and...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes a case that the iPhone has become so good that the latest changes didn't, and couldn't, improve it very much, and the discovery of a way to penetrate the https encryption used by financial and e-commerce institutions.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Google Glasses Movie and iPhone Fatigue
